results.title: Metformin and Covid-19: Focused Review of Mechanisms and Current Literature Suggesting Benefit
results.text_hl: In the 1940s-50s, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed benefit when used in @<m>DISEASE_Influenza_Human</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007251 @@@influenza infection@@@, and was noted to lower @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, but not below physiologic levels.

results.title: Metformin in Antiviral Therapy: Evidence and Perspectives.
results.text_hl: By activating @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ depletes cellular energy reserves that viruses rely on, effectively limiting the replication of pathogens such as @<m>DISEASE_Influenza_Human</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007251 @@@influenza@@@, @SPECIES_11676 @@@HIV@@@, @SPECIES_2697049 @@@SARS-CoV-2@@@, HBV, and HCV.

citations.NLM: Halabitska I, Petakh P, Lushchak O, Kamyshna I, Oksenych V, Kamyshnyi O. Metformin in Antiviral Therapy: Evidence and Perspectives. Viruses. 2024 Dec 18;16(12):. PMID: 39772244

results.title: Role of metformin in various pathologies: state-of-the-art microcapsules for improving its pharmacokinetics.
results.text_hl: In the last century, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was discovered twice for its antiglycemic properties in addition to its antimalarial and anti-@<m>DISEASE_Influenza_Human</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007251 @@@influenza@@@ effects.
